name: chameleon-deception-system
description: Chameleon Adaptive Deception System - Advanced Cybersecurity Honeypot

scripts.start:backend: cd Backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd Backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd Backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Chameleon Security Team
